"To combat the evil which sways the world . . ." Pierre repeated, and a mental image of his future activity in this direction rose in his mind. He imagined men such as he had himself been a fortnight ago, and he addressed an edify- ing exhortation to them. He imagined to him- self vicious and unfortunate people whom he would as
